procedures.title: Basic Equipment Maintenance
steps: Turn off the equipment and unplug it.
Remove any dust from the external surface.
Check for any visible damage to the cords.

procedures.title: Advanced Maintenance Procedures
steps: Disassemble the equipment carefully.
Clean internal components with compressed air.
Replace worn-out parts if necessary.
Reassemble and test functionality.

procedures.title: Safety Check
steps: Ensure all safety equipment is in place.
Check emergency exits.
Perform a fire drill.

procedures.title: Daily Safety Inspection
steps: Inspect fire extinguishers.
Test smoke alarms and carbon monoxide detectors.
Check the condition of safety gear.

procedures.title: Precision Instrument Calibration
steps: Turn on the instrument and allow it to warm up.
Follow the manufacturer's calibration instructions.
Record the calibration results in the logbook.

procedures.title: Scale Calibration
steps: Place a known weight on the scale.
Adjust the scale to match the weight.
Re-check the scale with several weights.

procedures.title: Printer Troubleshooting
steps: Check the printer connection to the computer.
Ensure the printer has paper and ink.
Run a test print.
Reinstall printer drivers if necessary.

procedures.title: Network Troubleshooting
steps: Check the connection cables.
Restart the modem and router.
Run network diagnostics on the computer.
Check the IP configuration.

procedures.title: Basic Software Installation
steps: Download the software from the official website.
Run the installer and follow on-screen instructions.
Restart the computer after installation.

procedures.title: Advanced Hardware Installation
steps: Turn off the system and disconnect the power.
Carefully insert the hardware into the proper slot.
Reconnect all cables and power on the system.
Install necessary drivers.

procedures.title: Operating System Setup
steps: Boot the system from the installation media.
Follow the installation wizard to set up the OS.
Create a user account and set up a password.
Install system updates.

procedures.title: Database Configuration
steps: Install the database management software.
Create a new database instance.
Configure user permissions and roles.
Set up automated backups.

procedures.title: Server Software Setup
steps: Install the web server software.
Configure the firewall to allow incoming traffic.
Set up SSL certificates for security.
Deploy the application code to the server.

procedures.title: Routine System Maintenance
steps: Run disk cleanup to remove unnecessary files.
Defragment the hard drive.
Check for operating system updates.
Run antivirus scans.

procedures.title: Periodic Electrical Safety Check
steps: Inspect all electrical cords for wear.
Ensure all outlets are grounded.
Test the circuit breakers for proper operation.
Check emergency lighting systems.

procedures.title: Weight Calibration
steps: Place calibration weights on the scale.
Adjust the scale settings to match the weight readings.
Recheck the calibration with multiple weights.

procedures.title: Software Crash Troubleshooting
steps: Check for system updates.
Review system logs for error messages.
Reinstall the application.
Check for software compatibility issues.

procedures.title: Router Configuration Setup
steps: Log into the router using the default gateway address.
Set up a new SSID and password.
Enable security settings such as WPA2 encryption.
Reboot the router.

procedures.title: Initial Computer Setup
steps: Unpack the computer and connect peripherals.
Power on the system and go through the initial setup.
Install basic software such as a web browser and office suite.
Configure system security settings.
